mapper.select: SELECT hfo.hfo_seq AS option_seq, hfo.hfo_name AS option_name, hfo.hfo_dt AS option_date, hfo.hfo_rate AS option_rate, hfo.hfo_cycle AS option_cycle FROM house_fee_option hfo WHERE hfo.hfo_cycle != 0 AND hfo.hfo_dt <= now() AND hfo.hfo_hi_seq = #{house_seq}
SELECT hfi_base_price AS base_price, hfi_cleaning_fee AS cleaning_Fee, hfi_service_fee AS service_Fee FROM house_fee_info hfi WHERE hfi.hfi_hi_seq = #{house_seq}
